channel.title: CVE Feed for Projectworlds Pvt. Limited -- Leave Management System Project
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Projectworlds Pvt. Limited -- Leave Management System Project

item.title: CVE-2023-44482|2023-12-21T18:59:05.773Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- leave%20management%20system%20project
item.description: Leave Management System Project v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Authenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The 'setsickleave' parameter of the admin/setleaves.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-44480|2023-11-08T15:37:53.208Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- leave%20management%20system%20project
item.description: Leave Management System Project v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Authenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The 'setcasualleave' parameter of the admin/setleaves.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.

item.title: CVE-2023-44481|2023-12-21T18:58:20.939Z -- projectworlds%20pvt.%20limited -- leave%20management%20system%20project
item.description: Leave Management System Project v1.0 is vulnerable to multiple Authenticated SQL Injection vulnerabilities. The 'setearnleave' parameter of the admin/setleaves.php resource does not validate the characters received and they are sent unfiltered to the database.
